Author: bootload
Title: Getting back to POSH (Plain ol' Semantic HTML)

Author: tx
Content:
He is talking about a problem which is simply not there. Spam is not a big problem, (keep track of who you're giving your address to), but most importantly spam is not unique to email: give them (spammers) a channel to reach you and they will.

Besides, WHAT IS an email? How exactly is it different from SMS if I trip&forward it to my cell? Email is not even limited to a protocol or any specific software. Any kind of technical definition of "email" that one can come up with will probably evolve around SMTP, i.e. server-side.
